posts.author: @sama
posts.content: AGI in 2025 is looking more realistic than most people think. The pace of AI capability improvements is extraordinary.

posts.author: @paulg
posts.content: The best way to predict the future is to build it. Stop waiting for permission and just start shipping.

posts.author: @levelsio
posts.content: Built $500K revenue with no employees as a solo founder. The tools available today make this possible for anyone.

posts.author: @swyx
posts.content: AI agents are moving from research to production. Everyone should be building with them right now.

posts.author: @naval
posts.content: Specific knowledge cannot be taught. It can only be learned through apprenticeship and self-teaching.
